<title level="1" right="Action">[Collect Spirit Remnant](/Actions.aspx?ID=1160) <actions string="Three Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 23</row>

**Requirements** You're holding your _spirit dwelling_

</column>

---

You brandish your _spirit dwelling_ at the location where a [haunt](/Traits.aspx?ID=88), [ghost](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=51), or other [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) was destroyed within the last minute and pray or recite ritual incantations. You coax the spirit remnant into your spirit dwelling.
name: Collect Spirit Remnant
